Warga Protes Buat KTP Berbulan-Bulan, ini Tanggapan Disdukcapil Kubar
03 Nov 2019, 00:10 by Andreas Trisno



Warga Protes Buat KTP Berbulan-Bulan, ini Tanggapan Disdukcapil Kubar



Warga Protes Buat KTP Berbulan-Bulan, ini Tanggapan Disdukcapil Kubar


KBRN, Sendawar : Keluhan masyarakat soal pembuatan Kartu Tanda Penduduk Elektonik (KTP-el) terus saja muncul. Pasalnya tak jarang warga harus menunggu berbulan-bulan baru bisa mendapat fisik KTP-el. 
Hal itu seperti diungkapkan  Ebiyono salah satu warga Kabupaten Kutai Barat (Kubar) yang ia tulis di halaman media sosial Keluhan dan saran warga Kubar dan Kaltim Ibu Kota NKRI.
“KTP saya belum juga jadi-jadi sampai 3 bulan saya tunggu belum juga datang belangkonya. Dinas Capil Kutai Barat tolong percepat blanko KTP saya mau lamar kerja tidak ada KTP. Gimana saudara apa mampukah nunggu selama 3 bulan kalau ngga ada uang dan beras mau makan apa saya,” tulis Ebiyono di group facebook  yang dirilis RRI Sabtu, (2/11/2019).
Menanggapi keluhan itu dinas kependudukan dan pencatatan sipil (Disdukcapil) Kubar pun langsung merespon. Intansi yang dipimpin kepala dinas Jahariah itu beralasan pengadaan blanko KTP-el dilakukan oleh pemerintah pusat. Sementara kabupaten/kota seluruh Indonesia hanya menerima distribusi dari pusat yang proses pengambilannya harus ke Jakarta. Solusinya disdukcapil hanya memberikan surat keterangan (suket).
“Surat Keterangan Pengganti Tanda Identitas (Suket) sebagaimana diatur dalam pasal 59 ayat 2 huruf m dan Putusan Mahkamah Konstitusi tanggal 26 Maret 2019 dapat dipergunakan untuk segala kepentingan, Pelayanan Publik,” jawab disdukcapil.
“Kondisi stock blangko KTP-el di pusat sampai dengan saat ini kosong maka diberikan solusi dengan 2 katagori. Pertama bagi warga yang sudah memiliki KTP-el tetapi harus mengganti dikarenakan perubahan element data (pindah alamat,ubah status, perubahan tempat tgl lahir dll) maka hanya diberikan Suket,” katanya.
“Apabila stock blangko KTP-el sudah tersedia banyak maka disilahkan mendaftar ulang berkas dengan melampirkan suket asli. Bagi warga yang baru perekaman atau sudah pernah perekaman tetapi belum pernah tercetak TP-el maka akan diterbitkan suket, berkas langsung didaftarkan untuk diproses pencetakan apabila tersedia blangko dan apabila sudah tercetak akan kami umumkan melalui media ini dan pengumuman di kantor,” lanjut dukcapil.
Disdukcapil saat ini disebut sudah mendapat distribusi blangko sebanyak 500 keping. Dan sedang dalam pencetakan untuk berkas yang sudah diterima sampai dengan tanggal 6 September 2019.
“Bapak Ebiyono silahkan dilihat permasalahan bapak masuk katagori mana. Apabila masuk katagori 1 maka sabaaaaar. Katagori 2 dan 3 maka anda beruntung bawa slip pengambilan berikan ke loket 5. Demikian penjelasan kami mohon maaf atas keterbatasan dan ketidaknyamanan didalam pelayanan kami semoga hari esok lebih baik dari hari ini,” jelas dukcapil.
Meski diberi penjelasan, sejumlah warganet masih kurang puas.
“Terus berapa lama lagi kiranya blangko tersebut sudah ada di Disdukcapil Kubar,” tanya warga dengan akun Indra Jaka Baruna.
“Itulah kebijakan pusat yang tidak pro otonomi. Seharusnya mereka memberikan kewenangan seperti ini kepada daerah untuk melakukan cetak blanko tentunya dengan standar atau spesifikasi yang telah ditentukan pusat demikian juga dengan blanko SIM dan Plat,” tambah akun lain bernama Ipul Bojes.
“Namnya juga rkayat mengeluh ya ke daerahnya. Jika itu dari Jakarta dariman sekalipun tidak mau tau karena itu tanggungjawab pemerintah,” timpa pengguna akun Hakul Hulu.
Data Disdukcapil Kubar yang di rilis RRI dari papan informasi di stan pameran pembangunan memperingati HUT Kubar KE-20 di Lamin Taman Budaya Sendawar menerangkan, ada 114.129 wajib KTP hingga 2018. Terdiri dari perempuan 54.004 dan laki-laki 60.123 orang. Yang sudah memiliki KTP berjumlah 108.399 orang. Artinya masih 5.730 orang yang belum memiliki KTP. Ini belum terhitung warga pendatang yang terus bertambah.
Namun Disdukcapil Kubar juga melakukan berbagai upaya untuk mempermudah masyarakat mendapatkan identitas diri tersebut. Misalnya dengan menggelar kegiatan jemput bola ke sekolah maupun desa-desa. Hanya saja lagi-lagi keterbatasan blanko yang membuat pencetakan KTP seumur hidup ini jadi sedikiti terhambat.
Sementara itu pemerintah juga menginovasi pelayanan yang lebih mudah dalam pembuatan KTP-el dengan tetap menjamin kebasahannya. Salah satunya melalui Peraturan Presiden (Perpres) Nomor 96 Tahun 2018 tentang Persyaratan dan Tata Cara Pendaftaran Penduduk dan Pencatatan Sipil. Dengan Perpres itu, masyarakat kini lebih dimudahkan dalam membuat kartu identitas.
Menurut Perpres yang ditandatangani Presiden Joko Widodo pada 16 Oktober 2018  tersebut, pelayanan pendaftaran penduduk terdiri atas pencatatan biodata penduduk, penerbitan KK (Kartu Keluarga), penerbitan KTP-el, penerbitan surat keterangan kependudukan, dan pendaftaran penduduk rentan Administrasi Kependudukan.
"Perekaman dan penerbitan KTP-el baru oleh Disdukcapil Kabupaten/Kota di luar domisili dapat dilakukan dengan memenuhi persyaratan tidak melakukan perubahan data penduduk dan KK," bunyi Pasal 22.Dalam Perpres 96/2018, pengurusan e-KTP atau dokumen kependudukan secara umum tidak lagi mensyaratkan surat pengantar, baik dari RT, RW, kelurahan ataupun kecamatan. Masyarakat hanya cukup membawa fotocopy KK ke kantor Disdukcapil setempat.
Seperti diatur dalam Pasal 15 Perpres 96/2018 tentang Persyaratan dan Tata Cara Pendaftaran Penduduk dan Pencatatan Sipil. Pasal tersebut menyatakan, bahwa penerbitan E-KTP hanya memerlukan 2 persyaratan, yakni telah berusia 17 tahun, sudah kawin, atau pernah kawin dan Kartu Keluarga.

Residents Protest for KTP for Months, This Disdukcapil Kubar's Response
03 Nov 2019, 00:10 by Andreas Trisno



Residents Protest for KTP for Months, This Disdukcapil Kubar's Response



Residents Protest for KTP for Months, This Disdukcapil Kubar's Response


KBRN, Sendawar: Public complaints about the making of an Electronic Identity Card (KTP-el) continue to emerge. Because it is not uncommon for residents to have to wait for months before they can physically obtain an KTP el.
That was said by Ebiyono, a resident of West Kutai Regency (Kubar), which he wrote on the social media pages Complaints and suggestions from residents of Kubar and East Kalimantan, the capital city of the Republic of Indonesia.
"My ID card has not yet been made so that until 3 months I have not yet arrived for the wallet. West Kutai Capil Service please expedite the blank KTP I want to apply for a job there is no KTP. How can you wait for 3 months if you don't have money and what rice do I want to eat, "Ebiyono wrote on the Facebook group released by RRI on Saturday (11/02/2019).
Responding to the complaint Kubar's population and civil registration office (Disdukcapil) responded immediately. The agency led by the head of the Jahariah service reasoned that the procurement of blank KTP-el was carried out by the central government. While districts / cities throughout Indonesia only accept distribution from the center where the process of collection must go to Jakarta. The solution is for disdukcapil to only provide a certificate (suket).
"Certificate of Substitution of Identity Signs (Suket) as regulated in article 59 paragraph 2 letter m and the Constitutional Court Decision dated March 26, 2019 can be used for all purposes, Public Services," answered Disdukcapil.
"The condition of the KTP-el blank stock in the center until now is empty, so there is a solution with 2 categories. First for residents who already have an KTP-el but must change due to changes in data elements (change of address, change status, change of date of birth etc.) then only given Suket, "he said.
"If there is a large stock of KTP-el available, it is recommended to re-register the file by attaching the original box. For residents who have just recorded or have never recorded but have not yet printed an e-mail, then a suket will be issued, the file will be directly registered for printing if there is a blank and if it has been printed we will announce it through this media and announcement at the office, "continued dukcapil.
Disdukcapil is said to have received 500 copies of blank distribution. And currently in printing for files that have been received until September 6, 2019.
"Mr. Ebiyono, please look at the problem where you enter the category. If you are in category 1, then saaaaaar. Categories 2 and 3 then you are lucky to bring the collection slip to the counter 5. Thus our explanation we apologize for the limitations and inconvenience in our service, hopefully tomorrow is better than today, "explained dukcapil.
Although given an explanation, a number of citizens are still not satisfied.
"And how much longer can the blank be available at Kubar Disdukcapil," asked the residents with the Indra Jaka Baruna account.
"That is the central policy which is not pro-autonomy. They should give this kind of authority to the regions to print blanks, of course, with standards or specifications that have been determined by the center as well as blanks for SIMs and plates, "added another account named Ipul Bojes.
"His name is also the household's complaint to the area. Even if it's from Jakarta, you don't want to know because it's the responsibility of the government, ”said the user of the Hakul Hulu account.
Data from Disdukcapil Kubar released by RRI from the information board at the development exhibition booth commemorating the 20th Anniversary of Kubar in Lamin Taman Budaya Sendawar explained that there were 114,129 required KTPs until 2018. Consisting of 54,004 women and 60,123 men. Those who already have a KTP number 108,399 people. This means that there are still 5,730 people who do not have a KTP. This is not counting the number of newcomers who continue to grow.
However, Disdukcapil Kubar also made various efforts to make it easier for the community to get their identity. For example, by holding a ball pick up activities to schools and villages. It's just that again the limitations of the blank that makes printing a lifetime ID card is a bit hampered.
Meanwhile, the government is also innovating easier services in making KTP-el while still ensuring its wetness. One of them is through Presidential Regulation (Perpres) No. 96 of 2018 concerning Requirements and Procedures for Population Registration and Civil Registration. With the Perpres, the public is now more facilitated in making identity cards.
According to the Presidential Regulation signed by President Joko Widodo on October 16, 2018, the population registration service consists of recording population biodata, issuance of KK (Family Card), issuing KTP-el, issuing a population certificate, and registering vulnerable population Population Administration.
"Recording and issuance of new KTP-el by Disdukcapil Regency / City outside the domicile can be done by fulfilling the requirements of not changing population data and KK," said Article 22. In Perpres 96/2018, management of e-KTPs or population documents in general is not again requires a letter of introduction, both from RT, RW, village or district. The community only needs to bring a photocopy of KK to the local Disdukcapil office.
As regulated in Article 15 of Perpres 96/2018 concerning Requirements and Procedures for Population Registration and Civil Registration. The article states that the issuance of E-KTP only requires 2 requirements, namely 17 years old, already married, or ever married and a family card.
